Name: Cold Fear™
About the game: In a ferocious Arctic storm, distress signals are sent from a mysterious Russian whaler. As leading Coast Guard veteran Tom Hansen, you board to investigate  and discover unthinkable horrors lurking beneath the ship's bloodstained decks. Brave dangerous waters: Rocked by huge breakers, you must steady your nerves  and aim  to evade a watery grave. Keep your bearings: Battle against increasingly mutated enemies in treacherous, unstable environments. Unleash a torrent of weapons: Create fatal traps and use shotguns, flame throwers, or any object you can find to survive.
Meta Title: Cold Fear™: May 13, 2008, Darkworks and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cold Fear™? Check out the release date (May 13, 2008), developer insights from Darkworks, and a complete game summary.
